title: Grey square covering map?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Ever since the last update there has been a grey square covering my map. It`s annoying and makes it very difficult to play global champs like Noc and Rek (Who I happen to main lol). Was wondering how to get rid of it?

replies.body:
Looks like it's probably a background app trying to draw an overlay on top of League. Try running a [clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure those background apps don't start, to see if it resolves this issue.

Let me know if that helped.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jxxdHYoi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-31T01:26:53.485+0000)
>
> Looks like it's probably a background app trying to draw an overlay on top of League. Try running a [clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure those background apps don't start, to see if it resolves this issue.
> 
> Let me know if that helped.

I feel so stupid... when I updated GeForce Experience the camera automatically turned on, and since my camera was pointing towards the ceiling it was a grey box... thanks though for the help, I wouldn't have found that out unless I did a clean boot
I'm not sure and don't have this prob but upvoted to help you out.
